skills.skill: Microsoft Desktop and Server Operating Systems

duties_responsibilities.duty: Configuring new desktops, routers, modems, and similar devices.
Troubleshooting Zoom / Zoom Room applications and hardware.
Substantiating requests for hardware and software purchases and upgrades.
Active Directory management / Azure AD / hybrid model.
Managing multiple cases at one time.
Tracking tickets in ITSM ticketing System.
Analytical in problem solving with the ability to apply original and innovative thinking.
Applying knowledge of technologies including Microsoft, Infrastructure Networks, thin client technologies, and server virtualization.
